title: Emelia Hartford
description:
Emelia Hartford is an automotive content creator and influencer who builds AMAZING cars. Recently, she bolted turbos onto her C8 Corvette and swapped a K-series Honda motor into....a Prius. She's also a co-host of "Sorted".

@ms.emelia

Support her apparel brand: With Love Supply

Watch Sorted: https://www.sortedornot.com


To get your FREE gift, just go to JoinFightCamp.com slash TST. JoinFightCamp.com slash TST.

Follow us!

T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman
 

Watch the show!:
